programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: The jury's decision in the murder trial of Frederick Mueller, who was accused of killing his wife.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Investigating the murder of hotel heir Benji Novack Jr.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Relatives of a beauty queen who was murdered more than 50 years ago suspect a priest committed the crime.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: New information in the case of a woman accused of killing her fiance during a kayaking trip may prove her innocence.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: John Harper terrorized his neighbors on Dictionary Hill; he hurled curses, threw stones and drove cars off the road; when local police failed to stop him, one resident took matters, and a pistol, into his own hands.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: On the surface the Carters seemed like a happy family of Iowa farmers, but when they discover Shirley Carter shot to death in her kitchen, the family begins pointing fingers at each other.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Iowa farmer Tom Lyon is excited when a nearby plot of land goes up for sale, but he isn't the only one. When Lyon's body is discovered at the bottom of a well, the trail of blood leads through that very land.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Goode, Virginia, a 50-year age gap proves a nightmare for a wealthy retired businessman and his violent girlfriend; In Austin, Texas, a millionaire wakes up and discovers he's been shot.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Merrillville, Indiana, there are deadly secrets between family members; near Manchester, England, a late night flower delivery is a test run for murder.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Kansas City, Missouri, a woman falls for a hustler and pays a devastating price; in Castlerock, Northern Ireland, a dentist falls for a patient, and comes up with an unusual treatment plan.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Westchester County, New York, a wife begins a fling with a co-worker which leads to an erotic game with a violent conclusion.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Ventura, California, a wife goes missing after a mysterious arrest; while in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, thousands of dollars stored in shoeboxes provide a vital clue to solve a murder.

programme.title: Murderous Affairs
programme.desc: In Boone County, Iowa, a man on a farm believes that he's shot himself but can't figure out how; in Pryor, Oklahoma, an affair turns deadly, resulting in a house fire.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A seemingly charming and generous California man targets vulnerable women for murder, prompting a cross-country manhunt.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: The FBI sets up a sting operation to stop the criminal actions of an entertainment industry giant after a TV producer is gunned down.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: A determined team tracked the flamboyant crime boss John Gotti, who assumed control of the Gambino crime family in 1985.

programme.desc: Chicago police hunt for a dangerous bank-robber.

programme.desc: White-supremacist brothers embark on a cross-country crime spree.

programme.desc: On Jan. 27, 2001, two beloved professors at Dartmouth College are brutally murdered in their home. Investigators suspect teenagers to be the perpetrators.

programme.desc: A sniper targets black men.

programme.desc: Authorities try to gather evidence of murder and drug trafficking by a Washington, D.C., gang.

programme.desc: Authorities range from Alabama to Virginia in search of cousins suspected of seven murders, robbery and possession of an arsenal.

programme.desc: The police call in the FBI when they suspect that a woman's former lover is responsible for her disappearance, but they can't find a body or murder weapon.

programme.desc: The kidnapper of a teen wants ransom and his family's car.
